title: The Federal Reserve Will Get Flak No Matter What It Does
text:
The Federal Reserve, having patched the plumbing problem in the money markets this past week, turned its attention to a different part of the financial world: booming growth companies.

Boston Fed President Eric Rosengren took aim Friday at “co-working spaces in many major urban markets.” No need to name names, but he was talking about WeWork, whose parent last week delayed its much-ballyhooed initial public offering, after its putative equity value was deflated from a peak of $47 billion to about one-quarter as much. In the...
description: The central bank is in a vise as it deals with conflicting pressures from the economy and the White House.
